title: Kimchi mushroom and tofu stir fry
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon oil', '1 tablespoon finely chopped garlic', '1 medium onion, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '400g kimchi, roughly chopped', '1 (225g) tin bamboo shoots, drained', '8 baby corn, chopped', 'hot water, as needed', '1 (50g) packet bonito flavoured soup stock (optional)', '1 tablespoon Japanese assorted chilli pepper (nanami togarashi)', '2 tablespoons Chinese red vinegar', 'salt to taste', '200g enoki mushrooms, base removed', '1 (396g) block firm tofu, diced', '1 tablespoon sesame oil']
